original: @317a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @317a # // rgya gar skad du /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

analyzed: btsun pa zla ba'i smon lam zhes bya ba /

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri.

original: srid pa'i las ni nyam nga yis //
analyzed: srid pa'i las ni nyam nga yis //
translated: In the terrifying actions of existence,

original: gang dang gang du nyer skye ba //
analyzed: gang dang gang du nyer skye ba //

original: de dang der ni skyes pa dang // dad dang dbang po tshang ba dang // bzo dang sgyu rtsal kun mngon shes //
analyzed: de dang der ni skyes pa dang // dad dang dbang po tshang ba dang // bzo dang sgyu rtsal kun mngon shes //
translated: I will be skilled in all crafts and arts,ğŸ”½I will be fearless in all treatises,

original: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med dang // 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs shing //
analyzed: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med dang // 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs shing //
translated: I will turn my back on all desires,ğŸ”½I will give away all my possessions,

original: dngos kun yongs su gtong ba dang // dran dang ldan zhing bden smra dang / sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' //
analyzed: dngos kun yongs su gtong ba dang // dran dang ldan zhing bden smra dang / sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' //
translated: I will be mindful, truthful, and pleasing to behold for sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems kyis rnam brgyan pa'i //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis rnam brgyan pa'i //
translated: Adorned with the mind of enlightenment,ğŸ”½I will rely on spiritual friends,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang // dul ba'i spyod dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang // dul ba'i spyod dang yang dag ldan //
translated: I will be endowed with disciplined conduct,

original: blo bzang skye ba gtsang ma dran //
analyzed: blo bzang skye ba gtsang ma dran //
translated: I will remember my pure past lives,

original: sdig pa'i las la 'jigs byed pas //
analyzed: sdig pa'i las la 'jigs byed pas //
translated: And I will fear negative actions.

original: spyod pa dge ba'i spyod yul can //
analyzed: spyod pa dge ba'i spyod yul can //
translated: And whose conduct is virtuous.

original: mthar yang bla med rtogs pa yis //
analyzed: mthar yang bla med rtogs pa yis //
translated: And in the end, through realizing the unsurpassed,

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu bsten pas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu bsten pas //
translated: By relying on the ten perfections,ğŸ”½I will attain the state of the unshakable protector

original: 'gro la gcig tu bde ba yi //ğŸ”½g-yo med mgon po thob par gyur //
analyzed: 'gro la gcig tu bde ba yi // g-yo med mgon po thob par gyur //
translated: Who is solely devoted to the welfare of beings.

original: bdag ni bran dang mor ma gyur //
analyzed: bdag ni bran dang mor ma gyur //
translated: May I never be a slave or a woman,ğŸ”½May I never be stupid or born in a lowly country,

original: blun dang yul ngan skye ba dang // sangs rgyas 'byung la lkog ma gyur //
analyzed: blun dang yul ngan skye ba dang // sangs rgyas 'byung la lkog ma gyur //
translated: May I never be born when a buddha has not appeared,

original: nam du'ang lta ba log ma gyur //
analyzed: nam du'ang lta ba log ma gyur //
translated: And may I never have wrong views.

original: 'dod med tshul ldan sangs rgyas rgyur //
analyzed: 'dod med tshul ldan sangs rgyas rgyur //
translated: Without desire, with pure conduct,

original: pha rol 'dod pa'i rdzas longs spyod //ğŸ”½sems can nyam thag byed 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: pha rol 'dod pa'i rdzas longs spyod // sems can nyam thag byed 'gyur ba'i //
translated: And with the wealth of generosity to others,

original: 'dod pa'i slong mo bdag mi spyod //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i slong mo bdag mi spyod //
translated: I will not engage in the begging of desireğŸ”½Which causes suffering for sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams la byams goms shing //
analyzed: sems can rnams la byams goms shing //
translated: I will cultivate love for all sentient beingsğŸ”½And will not look to the fruition of my actionsğŸ”½In the form of a buddha or bodhisattva

analyzed: rgyu med rang bzhin sangs rgyas dang // byang @317b sems 'gro ba'i 'bras mi lta //
translated: Without cause or inherent nature.ğŸ”½I will be born in a great family, with intelligence and wealth,

original: rigs chen blo nor skye ba dang // skye ba skye bar lus mdzes shing //
analyzed: rigs chen blo nor skye ba dang // skye ba skye bar lus mdzes shing //
translated: And in life after life, my body will be beautiful

original: bde gshegs mang po'i snyan ngag byed //
analyzed: bde gshegs mang po'i snyan ngag byed //

original: skye zhing skye ba dang ldan par //
analyzed: skye zhing skye ba dang ldan par //
translated: And in every birth,ğŸ”½In whatever family

analyzed: gang du sangs rgyas lhar byed pa'i //

original: rigs der bdag ni skye ba dang // skye ba dang ni skye ba ru //
analyzed: rigs der bdag ni skye ba dang // skye ba dang ni skye ba ru //
translated: In birth after birth,ğŸ”½And never abandon

original: chos lnga po ni mi spong zhing //
analyzed: chos lnga po ni mi spong zhing //

original: bsod nams ye shes stobs dang ni //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes stobs dang ni //

analyzed: brtson 'grus byang chub sems lnga po //

original: ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa yi //ğŸ”½zhabs thob pa yi thabs de bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa yi // zhabs thob pa yi thabs de bzhin //
translated: Just as the omniscient oneğŸ”½Attained the state of a buddha,

analyzed: de ltar bdag gis thabs kyis ni //
translated: In the same way, through these methods,ğŸ”½May I attain the state of a buddha.
